title: [SKIN] PROJECT Skin Selection on ARAM not working with BOOST
body:
Unlocking a boost on ARAM didn't allow me to choose a PROJECT skin for Zed. 

Don't really want to reproducing this for obvious reasons (not wanting to waste RP). When it happened to me I was in a 5 man team on ARAM. Unlocking the BOOST didn't allow me to lock in the PROJECT: Zed, instead just locked me Shockblade.

replies.body:
Hey Sapphire06,

When you purchase a skin boost, a skin is selected at random, you're not able to pick the skin yourself.

Is this something that can be changed? It's pretty dumb to be honest that you can't choose. I was in a game the other day where someone did the boost, and I ended up with a skin that I already owned even though I tried to select another skin.

It's not, no. I can check into the instance where you get a skin you already own, though.

**EDIT**: You shouldn't end up with a skin you already own (unless, of course, you own all of the skins for a particular champion). We'll take a look into this.
Hi Katey!! Thank you for clarifying! :) Don't buy them often, so guess that's why I didn't know! Really cool seeing your reply. Enjoy your day!
No worries! It's actually a pretty common question, and I can see where there'd be a bit of confusion! Take care!
